Description:
INSJD260122.01 - 312232093
You have failed to arrange for the safe handling and storage of dangerous substances, namely flammable paint products, in that you were storing said products in an unsuitable internal room.

INSJD260122.02 - 312232128
You have failed to ensure that an engineering control measure, namely the Local Exhaust Ventilation (LEV) systems designated LEV1 and LEV 2 provided to control exposure to wood dust, have been maintained in an efficient state and in efficient working order in that aspects of both systemsâ€™ performance were found to be unsatisfactory during a thorough examination of said systems carried out by a competent person in October 2021.
